body:
The registration site for the 2015 International Radiance Workshop is up and running at http://www.cvent.com/events/14th-annual-international-radiance-workshop/event-summary-9869b51ebebe45ad8cb25fdf2e31fd89.aspx.   There has been limited response to the call for presentations. If you are interested in providing a short presentation on how you or your firm have applied Radiance in your work, please send a short abstract (300 words or less) to 2015RadianceWS at gmail.com<mailto:2015RadianceWS at gmail.com> ASAP.  Participation is highly encouraged.


Richard Mistrick
Penn State University
___
